feed.title: Combined summary - Applying clang-format to Bitcoin Core

entry.title: Combined summary - Applying clang-format to Bitcoin Core
entry.summary: To ensure a consistent style in the C++ source, the process is being implemented through clang-format (LLVM) and $repo/src/.clang-format. Applying a patch to the tree can sometimes be difficult due to reformatting issues. However, Jeff Garzik, an open source evangelist at BitPay Inc. and Bitcoin core developer, suggests that one can easily apply clang-format and then rediff to fix this issue.
